Schmith¨usen Outline Intro BSRN Toolbox Quality Checks Quality Codes Usage Demo Produced Quality Codes One QC per measured value Designed as 6-bit array (decimal numbers 0 − 63) 2 bits per physical possible limits extremely rare limits comparisons extendable for additional future checks QC oﬀered by BSRN Toolbox H.
